itunes:title: Episode 656 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/12/20 - UFC 252 Prediction Show
title: Episode 656 - DB Sports Companion Show 08/12/20 - UFC 252 Prediction Show
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the cancellation of the College Football for the Big 10 and PAC-12, why Ross believes if the other conferences play on without them they deserve the National Championship, why Lebron James is having a hard time in ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the cancellation of the College Football for the Big 10 and PAC-12, why Ross believes if the other conferences play on without them they deserve the National Championship, why Lebron James is having a hard time in the bubble, and we give our predictions for UFC 252 for the entire main card. Ross and Dan are split on Cormier/Stipe.
